{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|氵|t1=water|𠬛|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – drown in water.

===Etymology 1===

====Pronunciation====
{{zh-pron
|m=méi

|w=5meq

====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# not [[have]]; there is not; to be without
#: {{zh-x|沒意思|uninteresting [literally: to not have fun]}}
#: {{zh-x|這兒{r} 沒 人。|There's nobody here.}}
# be not so ... as {{gloss|when comparing}}
#: {{zh-x|我 沒 你 高。|I'm not as tall as you.}}
# less than, no more than
# {{n-g|Negative prefix for verb {{zh-l|有|to have}}.}}
#: {{zh-x|我 沒有 朋友。|I have no friends.}}
# have not or did not {{gloss|negative prefix for verbs, translated into other languages with verbs in the past tense}}
#: {{zh-x|他 沒 來。|He hasn't come.}}

====Synonyms====
{{zh-dial|沒有}}

* {{zh-l|沒有}}
